alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Pike; Polk; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 9:19PM CST until January 11 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in southwestern Arkansas... East central Polk County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... Montgomery County in western Arkansas... * Until 1000 PM CST. * At 919 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bard Springs Recreation Area, or 7 miles north of Umpire, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Glenwood... Norman... Oden... Opal... Mimosa... Little Missouri Falls Recreatio... Shady... Bard Springs Recreation Area... Caney Creek Wilderness... Mauldin... Albert Pike Recreation Area... Black Springs... Big Fork... Langley... Pine Ridge... Shady Lake Recreation Area... Fancyhill... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
